text: Access multiple dictionaries with just a double click. It's amazing and incredibly useful for on-page dictionary work, making it the best one available.
this is very good. It's amazing for chinese user especially.
thank for author very much, it's my dreamy chrome extension

Saladict is an amazing plugin that provides practical and efficient translation services for users. The extension is user-friendly, easy to install, and incredibly useful for anyone who needs quick translations. I appreciate how the extension saves time during research as it offers on-the-spot translations of words and phrases in various languages.

Furthermore, Saladict's ability to integrate with other browsers like Chrome, Firefox, and Edge is an added advantage that makes it even more acc... Show more
Best dictionary ever, you can export your word list to anki directly

This is a good disctionary app but it interferes with google drive donwload. When it was on, I was not able to download any file from google drive webpage. The error message reads: "Can't download file. To download this file, trying enabling third-party cookie for Drive". My cookie setting was correct so I took the last suggestions made by google - turning off and on all extensions one by one to find out which extension was the culprit.
it's ok, but sometimes, the " search selected text outside of browser." doesn't work.
I have never used such a good translation software
There are way better than this out there. E.g. XTranslate https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/xtranslate/gfgpkepllngchpmcippidfhmbhlljhoo
Thank the author very much for his or her great help!
This pop up dictionary extension is the best I've ever used for English.
loved it，very helpful for my English learning！
Loving it. Powerful yet convenient features! Absolutely recommend!
there is not a option for turkish. But seems like good.
Install it by random. wow,  its a surprise, smart design and functions

Seems to be only useful for Chinese speakers. Tried using it for French -> English. It shows me Chinese definitions. A couple shown dictionaries had English translations but they are not very good. Instructions are only in Chinese are there are a million options so I don't know how to improve that situation or how to use it in different modes like the inline parentheses mode shown in screenshot. Uninstalled.
It does not seem to work if you intend to translate from Spanish to English. The results show in far eastern languages.

I've been using this extension for a while. One thing that has prevented me from using it more and liking it is the lacking of an automatic translation from english to spanish. I'm from Venezuela, and I use the extension to learn new words in english. So, I've tried to add words to my notebook, and it is crazy tedious to go searching for the translations in another window. I write the review because I want to know whether there's a way to fix this. Thank you.
BEST translation extension on Chrome EVER!! Thanks for ur great job!!
The best translation extension I've ever met!!!!
Excellent! The best translate and dictionaries extension!!! ;-)
The best translation extension I've ever used!

I was earlier skeptical about the extension due to its country of origin but as the project was open source, i gave it a try and i must say it really helps me everyday in learning the language.
Due to its productivity i think it should be included in editor's choice list.
Good translator extension :) works well and helps when I read
this is my first time rate a extension automatically.It is too good to be true.better than whatever dictionary that require money,best extension i have ever used.a life saver!!!
Perfect extension for Chrome. I can not stop my searching until the Saladict. many thanks.
The best pop up dictionary extension so far that i have been trying ever since. Thank you very much for making such a great and innovational tool. Cheers, keep it up!
It's a best translation extension I have ever uesd. Good job!
Fast and elegant, thanks for your sharing!
A very useful tool to save time and learning English.

This is my favorite translation software
much useful than others, just need it on Android

This is probably my first review in the chrome extension store, but Saladict definitely deserves it! Thanks for bringing us such a good plugin.
very usefull. thanks for your efforts!

best dictionary of it's kind on the market. free and powerful.

Awesome, It's the most useful dictionary

How can I change Target language (default) in Saladict (Google Translate) to German or other language? Anyway I really like it.

It is the best dictionary I've ever seen! It's powerful and with many user-friendly designs such as adjusting the fold-size, changing the sequence of dictionary, selecting animation style and so on. Thank you very much!
The best translation extension I have ever used!
how can it so useful!!!what a amazing extension!!!

it's a really useful application, which helps a lot

Saladict does NOT support the developer version of the google chrome. Hope it will be fixed soon. Thx

This is the greatest extension for Translation I've ever used!! If translator in other languages(Spanish/Japanese,etc) can be used that would be even better!

One Small bug I've found in an updated version recently, that the attachment cannot be downloaded directly in gmail inbox if I enable the PDF Viewer in Saladict, unless I do the right click on the attachment and open a new tab.(Which I could download directly in the previous version)

Overall it's awesome!非常感谢！
it`s the most greatest translating tool.Thanks for sharing by crimx
